TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit GCHandle extends System.ValueType

summary.span: 提供用于从非托管内存访问托管对象的方法。

span.span: Provides a way to access a managed object from unmanaged memory.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 结构与枚举一起使用, 以创建对应于任何托管对象的句柄。The structure is used with the enumeration to create a handle corresponding to any managed object. 此句柄可以是以下四种类型`Weak`之一`WeakTrackResurrection`: `Normal`、、 `Pinned`或。This handle can be one of four types: `Weak`, `WeakTrackResurrection`, `Normal`, or `Pinned`. 如果分配了句柄, 则在非托管客户端持有唯一引用时, 可以使用它来防止垃圾回收器收集托管的对象。When the handle has been allocated, you can use it to prevent the managed object from being collected by the garbage collector when an unmanaged client holds the only reference. 如果没有这样的句柄, 则在代表非托管客户端完成其工作之前, 垃圾回收器可以收集该对象。Without such a handle, the object can be collected by the garbage collector before completing its work on behalf of the unmanaged client. 你还可以使用来创建一个固定的对象, 该对象返回内存地址以防止垃圾回收器将对象移动到内存中。You can also use to create a pinned object that returns a memory address to prevent the garbage collector from moving the object in memory. 如果句柄超出范围, 则必须通过调用方法来显式释放该句柄; 否则, 可能会发生内存泄漏。When the handle goes out of scope you must explicitly release it by calling the method; otherwise, memory leaks may occur. 当你释放固定的句柄时, 关联的对象将被取消固定, 并且如果没有其他引用, 就会成为垃圾回收的条件。When you free a pinned handle, the associated object will be unpinned and will become eligible for garbage collection, if there are no other references to it. ## Examples 下面的示例演示一个`App`类, 该类`GCHandle.Alloc`使用方法创建托管对象的句柄, 这会阻止收集托管的对象。The following example shows an `App` class that creates a handle to a managed object using the `GCHandle.Alloc` method, which prevents the managed object from being collected. 对`EnumWindows`方法的调用会传递委托和托管对象 (两者都声明为托管类型, 但不显示), 并将句柄强制转换为。A call to the `EnumWindows` method passes a delegate and a managed object (both declared as managed types, but not shown), and casts the handle to an . 非托管函数将该类型作为回调函数的参数传递回调用方。The unmanaged function passes the type back to the caller as a parameter of the callback function. [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.InteropServices.GCHandle#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Runtime.InteropServices.GCHandle/cs/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Runtime.InteropServices.GCHandle#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Runtime.InteropServices.GCHandle/vb/sample.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance native int AddrOfPinnedObject() cil managed

summary.span: 在 句柄中检索对象的地址。

span.span: Retrieves the address of an object in a handle.

returns.span: 形式的固定对象的地址。

span.span: The address of the pinned object as an .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法用于获取指向对象的稳定指针。This method is used to get a stable pointer to the object. 固定对象可防止垃圾回收器在内存中移动该对象, 从而降低垃圾回收器的效率。Pinning an object prevents the garbage collector from moving it around in memory, thereby reducing the efficiency of the garbage collector.

exception.span: 该句柄是 以外的任何类型。

span.span: The handle is any type other than .

permission.span: 需要对直接调用方的完全信任。

span.span: requires full trust for the immediate caller.

permission.span: 部分受信任的或透明的代码不能使用此成员。

span.span: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.

summary.span: 为指定的对象分配句柄。

span.span: Allocates a handle for the specified object.

summary.span: 为指定的对象分配 句柄。

returns.span: 一个新的 ，它保护对象不被垃圾回收。

returns.span: 当不再需要 时，必须通过 将其释放。

span.span: This must be released with when it is no longer needed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 句柄是不透明的, 这意味着你不能通过句柄解析它包含的对象的地址。 handles are opaque, which means that you cannot resolve the address of the object it contains through the handle. ## Examples 下面的示例演示一个`App`类, 该类`GCHandle.Alloc`使用方法创建托管对象的句柄, 这会阻止收集托管的对象。The following example shows an `App` class that creates a handle to a managed object using the `GCHandle.Alloc` method, which prevents the managed object from being collected. 对`EnumWindows`方法的调用会传递委托和托管对象 (两者都声明为托管类型, 但不显示), 并将句柄强制转换为。A call to the `EnumWindows` method passes a delegate and a managed object (both declared as managed types, but not shown), and casts the handle to an . 非托管函数将该类型作为回调函数的参数传递回调用方。The unmanaged function passes the type back to the caller as a parameter of the callback function. [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.InteropServices.GCHandle#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Runtime.InteropServices.GCHandle/cs/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Runtime.InteropServices.GCHandle#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Runtime.InteropServices.GCHandle/vb/sample.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用方必须确保对于给定的句柄, 只调用一次。The caller must ensure that for a given handle, is called only once. ## Examples 下面的示例演示一个`App`类, 该类`GCHandle.Alloc`使用方法创建托管对象的句柄, 这会阻止收集托管的对象。The following example shows an `App` class that creates a handle to a managed object using the `GCHandle.Alloc` method, which prevents the managed object from being collected. 对`EnumWindows`方法的调用会传递委托和托管对象 (两者都声明为托管类型, 但不显示), 并将句柄强制转换为。A call to the `EnumWindows` method passes a delegate and a managed object (both declared as managed types, but not shown), and casts the handle to an . 非托管函数将该类型作为回调函数的参数传递回调用方。The unmanaged function passes the type back to the caller as a parameter of the callback function. summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示是否分配了句柄。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the handle is allocated.

value.span: 如果分配了句柄，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the handle is allocated; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用句柄来确定是否仍然可用时, 请使用此属性。Use this property when using handles to determine if the is still available. 当垃圾回收器收集对象时, 句柄仍可在终结器中复活。When the garbage collector collects the object, the handle can still be resurrected in the finalizer. 在这种情况下, 不会分配句柄 (当垃圾回收器尝试收集对象时, 它会丢失), 即使目标对象有效也是如此。In that case, the handle is not allocated (it is lost when the garbage collector attempts to collect the object), even though the target object is valid.
